thread.title: Hearthstone Price Changes Coming to Europe for PC, Mac, and Android
thread.title_full: Hearthstone Price Changes Coming to Europe for PC, Mac, and Android

author: Fluxflashor
title: Hearthstone Price Changes Coming to Europe for PC, Mac, and Android
text:
Quote from Zaerhinon 
We’d like to let everyone know that we’ll soon be adjusting the pricing of Hearthstone purchases made through the PC, Mac and Android clients, and through the Battle.net Shop. We regularly look at our pricing around the world, and from time to time we make changes such as these to align with local and regional market conditions. The price of the Un’Goro prelaunch bundle offer will not be affected by this change and will remain the same until launch.The new PC, MAC and Battle.net Shop prices will take effect on March 22, 2017. You can see the updated prices below: EURO
